name: Katamri Clomancy
description:
Katamari Clonancy is a physics based game inspired by the game Katamari Damac, where you play as a ball that can pickup other objects on screen. These include the different colored blocks as well as the massive following enemies. However you cannot pickup everything at once or at the start as you need to get big enough pickup all that weight.

Controls:

Movement - W,A,S,D

Pause - ESC

Camera - Arrow Keys
